column5: I just tucked my boat in for the winter and my storage guy has 2 spots left. Suitable for 18' boats or cars and will cost $40/month. Clean and dry indoor storage on concrete. In three years, I've never had any trouble arranging pickup or drop off times. Just tell him when and he's there.  Call for details: Brian 519-866-5773  He's located in Richmond Ontario. 10 minutes south west of Tilsonburg off Hwy 3 Or 45 minutes south east of London   View Larger Map
